sourcesContent: import applicationUserManager from "./Auth/applicationusermanager"; import userAuth from "./Auth/UserAuth"; export default { name: "Home", mixins: [userAuth], data: function() { return {}; }, watch: { $route: async function(to, from) { //这里使用Id4授权认证，用Jwt，请删之； // await this.refreshUserInfo(); } }, methods: { async login() { try { await applicationUserManager.login(); } catch (error) { console.log(error); this.$root.$emit("show-snackbar", { message: error }); } }, async logout() { try { await applicationUserManager.logout(); this.$store.commit("saveToken", ""); } catch (error) { console.log(error); this.$root.$emit("show-snackbar", { message: error }); } } } };
